entries.npc_11: Oh, those wretched Jawas.  I'll never forgive them for that.
entries.npc_10: I seem to think so.  But I can't really remember.
entries.npc_5: Oh, I've been in all kinds.  I've been kidnapped, been in battles, been on secret missions...It's all too much.
entries.npc_9: Not just any R2 Unit.  This one is special.  His specialty seems to be finding trouble.
entries.player_8: Are you talking about an R2 Unit?
entries.npc_8: Oh gracious.  It seems his reputation precedes him again.
entries.player_7: Artoo the famous droid of the Alliance?
entries.npc_4: Ah.  Yes.  Well, I do seem to get into a lot of trouble.  Actually Artoo gets me into most of it.  Blasted little bolt heap.
entries.npc_3: Oh, thank goodness.  I was trying to keep out of trouble this time.
entries.npc_7: I've actually grown accustomed to it.
entries.npc_6: It seems to be all I get.
entries.npc_2: I don't believe so.  But people rarely talk to me except to complain.
entries.npc_1: Oh dear, now what?  Have I done something wrong?
